story.iWant: to set up the project repository and development environment
story.soThat: the team can start collaborating on a stable codebase
story.tasks: - [ ] Initialize Next.js 15 project using `create-next-app` with TypeScript, Tailwind, and App Router. (AC: 1, 3) - [ ] Run `npx create-next-app@latest lyra-fashion --typescript --tailwind --app --src-dir` - [ ] Ensure `package.json` reflects Next.js 15+ and React 19+ (RC/Latest) - [ ] Verify folder structure matches architecture guidelines. (AC: 3) - [ ] Confirm existence of `src/app`, `src/components`, `src/lib` - [ ] Create placeholder directories if not generated automatically - [ ] Configure ESLint and Prettier. (AC: 4) - [ ] Verify `npm run lint` passes - [ ] Add `.prettierrc` if needed for consistent formatting - [ ] Initialize Git repository and configure `.gitignore`. (AC: 5) - [ ] `git init` - [ ] Ensure `.env.local` and `node_modules` are ignored - [ ] Verify application runs locally on port 3000. (AC: 2) - [ ] Run `npm run dev` - [ ] Check `localhost:3000` in browser - [ ] Commit initial setup to `main` branch. (AC: 5)

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Project initializes with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. 2. Application runs locally on port 3000 without errors. 3. Folder structure follows the `/src` directory pattern as defined in Architecture. 4. Linting (ESLint) and formatting (Prettier) commands run successfully. 5. Git repository is initialized with a proper `.gitignore`.

doc.title: Technical Specification: Epic 1 - Foundation & Infrastructure
doc.snippet: Project Initialization: Next.js 15 (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4 setup. Design System: Configuration of global styles, typography, colors, and core UI components (shadcn/ui).

doc.title: Architecture
doc.snippet: First implementation story must execute: npx create-next-app@latest lyra-fashion --typescript --tailwind --app --src-dir. This establishes the base architecture with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, ESLint, and /src directory pattern.

doc.title: Architecture
doc.snippet: Defines the directory structure: src/app, src/components, src/lib, etc.

story-context.constraints: - Use Next.js 15 App Router - Use TypeScript - Use Tailwind CSS v4 - Use /src directory structure - No production data seeding yet - No complex auth yet

tests.standards: Basic "Smoke Test": Application loads without console errors.
tests.ideas: - Verify package.json contains correct versions - Verify directory structure matches spec - Verify localhost:3000 loads - Verify lint command passes
